selections.name: On Location
selections.reason: Showed promise when 3rd at Townsville last start. Maps perfectly from barrier 2 in this depleted field.

selections.name: Blessed Boom
selections.reason: First starter by Spirit of Boom. Trialled well recently and finds a very winnable race on debut.

selections.name: Little Linda
selections.reason: Failed on debut but that was on a soft track. Can improve sharply here from the inside gate.

selections.name: Dub Stepping
selections.reason: Resuming. Needs to show more than debut effort but field is weak.

danger_horse.name: Blessed Boom
danger_horse.reason: Unexposed 2yo from a good stable, could easily win this without surprising.

selections.name: Fabulean
selections.reason: Brings superior class lines having raced in Open company. Consistent performer who rates highest here.

selections.name: Lady Willpower
selections.reason: Last start winner who broke maiden status in style. improving type.

selections.name: Wayno
selections.reason: Broke through for a maiden win last start. Drawn the rails and should be competitive.

selections.name: Girls Got Attitude
selections.reason: Another last start maiden winner. Steps up in grade but has confidence.

danger_horse.name: Lady Willpower
danger_horse.reason: Progressive filly coming off a win.

selections.name: Milk Maid
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed form which is superior to most here. Trial winner leading in.

selections.name: Belvedere Miss
selections.reason: First starter who has trialled solidly. Watch market moves.

selections.name: Better Storm
selections.reason: Resuming. Has shown glimpses of ability and draws the inside.

selections.name: Faraway Downs
selections.reason: Debutant. Trialled okay. Respect if betting support arrives.

danger_horse.name: Belvedere Miss
danger_horse.reason: Unknown quantity in a weak field.

selections.name: Pipistrelle
selections.reason: Class runner of the field with 7 career wins. Resuming but goes well fresh and scratches have decimated this field.

selections.name: Answering
selections.reason: Consistent type who rarely runs a bad race. Will be thereabouts.

selections.name: Rubunkar
selections.reason: Veteran with 9 wins. Drawn well and can figure in the placings.

selections.name: Journalism
selections.reason: Mixes form but capable on his day.

selections.name: Boom Crusher
selections.reason: Resuming. Won first-up last preparation. Rates highly in this grade.

selections.name: Rum Rumble
selections.reason: Placed last start and is race fit. Consistent performer.

selections.name: Marellity
selections.reason: Resuming. Won maiden at this track before spell. Has upside.

selections.name: Little Pinker
selections.reason: Resuming. Has placed fresh before. Respect.

selections.name: Next Stop Jupiter
selections.reason: Improving with racing. Solid 3rd last start and looks ready to win.

selections.name: Mr Sugar Daddy
selections.reason: Consistent placings recently. Wide gate a slight concern but has the ability.

selections.name: Ready And Betta
selections.reason: Placed last start. Drawn barrier 1 to get a soft run.

selections.name: Mississippi Dream
selections.reason: Fair effort last start. Can improve.

danger_horse.name: Mr Sugar Daddy
danger_horse.reason: Knocking on the door for a win.

selections.name: Amberinger
selections.reason: Last start winner who is in peak form. Hard to go past.

selections.name: New Level
selections.reason: Also a last start winner. Racing well and maps to get a good run.

selections.name: Unifies
selections.reason: Runner-up last start. Consistent type.

selections.name: Impressionism
selections.reason: Good run fresh. Will be fitter and suited by this distance.

selections.name: Be Bob Aloola
selections.reason: Last start winner at Emerald. Racing in great heart and looks the one to beat.

selections.name: Bitter Spirit
selections.reason: Runner-up to the scratched favorite (Whirlwind) last start. That form reads well here.

selections.name: Masali Raffa
selections.reason: Solid 2nd last start. Consistent performer in this grade.

selections.name: Misterkipchoge
selections.reason: Drops in class. Has been racing in tougher company.

danger_horse.name: Bitter Spirit
danger_horse.reason: Strong form line through the scratched runner.
